post:
### [VPSMost.hu](https://vpsmost.hu/en)

I would like to invite you to my newly opened VPS Hosting site which is now available in two languages (English and Hungarian). You can select the language in the top right corner.

The cheapest VPS is for €3/month ($3.17/mo).
-

Features:

- 1 CPU core
- 1 GB RAM
- 10 GB pure SSD storage
- 1 IPv4 address
- DDoS protection
- Fair share 1Gbps bandwidth
- France, Roubaix location
- LXC virtualization

You can also build your own desired server by selecting CPU cores, RAM and SSD storage space individually.

#### Creating a new VPS takes less than a minute. You just need to register, fill out your details, then deposit money (via PayPal or bank transfer).

Our site is fully responsive, so you can manage your servers from any mobile device.
You can ask support via our online chat our in e-mail: info@vpsmost.hu

#### Visit our website and register today: https://VPSmost.hu/en
